events.name: China Urges G20 to Address Global Debt Issues
events.wd_label: China Urges G20 to Address Global Debt Issues
events.wd_description: China called on G20 nations to conduct a fair and comprehensive analysis of global debt issues, emphasizing the need for joint actions by international financial institutions and commercial creditors.
events.description: China called on G20 nations to conduct a fair and comprehensive analysis of global debt issues, emphasizing the need for joint actions by international financial institutions and commercial creditors.

events.name: China's Call for Action
events.wd_description: China urged G20 nations to tackle global debt issues comprehensively and effectively, stressing the importance of joint actions by international financial institutions and commercial creditors.
events.description: China urged G20 nations to tackle global debt issues comprehensively and effectively, stressing the importance of joint actions by international financial institutions and commercial creditors.

events.name: G20 Finance Ministers Meeting
events.wd_description: China's Finance Minister Liu Kun participated in a video meeting with G20 finance ministers and central bank chiefs in Bengaluru, India, calling for a fair analysis of global debt issues.
events.description: China's Finance Minister Liu Kun participated in a video meeting with G20 finance ministers and central bank chiefs in Bengaluru, India, calling for a fair analysis of global debt issues.

events.name: Upcoming IMF Debt Roundtable
events.wd_description: Officials from the IMF, World Bank, and G7 nations will meet for the first face-to-face discussions at the new IMF Global Sovereign Debt Roundtable, with Zambia and Ghana awaiting China's support on debt restructuring.
events.description: Officials from the IMF, World Bank, and G7 nations will meet for the first face-to-face discussions at the new IMF Global Sovereign Debt Roundtable, with Zambia and Ghana awaiting China's support on debt restructuring.

events.name: President Biden's Surprise Visit to Kyiv
events.wd_label: President Biden's Surprise Visit to Kyiv
events.wd_description: U.S. President Joe Biden made a surprise visit to Kyiv, announcing a new $500 million assistance package for Ukraine and signaling strong American support for President Zelensky amid the ongoing conflict with Russia.
events.description: U.S. President Joe Biden made a surprise visit to Kyiv, announcing a new $500 million assistance package for Ukraine and signaling strong American support for President Zelensky amid the ongoing conflict with Russia.

events.name: Biden's Visit to Kyiv
events.wd_description: President Joe Biden made an unannounced visit to Kyiv, marking his first trip to Ukraine since Russia's invasion nearly a year ago, arriving in the early morning hours.
events.description: President Joe Biden made an unannounced visit to Kyiv, marking his first trip to Ukraine since Russia's invasion nearly a year ago, arriving in the early morning hours.

events.name: Announcement of New Assistance Package
events.wd_description: During his visit, Biden announced a new $500 million assistance package for Ukraine, including military equipment such as artillery ammunition, javelins, and Howitzers, along with upcoming sanctions on Moscow.
events.description: During his visit, Biden announced a new $500 million assistance package for Ukraine, including military equipment such as artillery ammunition, javelins, and Howitzers, along with upcoming sanctions on Moscow.

events.name: Significance of the Visit
events.wd_description: Biden's in-person visit to Kyiv demonstrated strong American support for President Zelensky and Ukraine, highlighting the U.S. commitment to the country amid the ongoing conflict with Russia.
events.description: Biden's in-person visit to Kyiv demonstrated strong American support for President Zelensky and Ukraine, highlighting the U.S. commitment to the country amid the ongoing conflict with Russia.

events.name: Russia Claims Control of Soledar
events.wd_description: Russia's military announced the capture of the salt-mine town of Soledar, considering it an important step for advancing towards Bakhmut, though its strategic significance is debated.
events.description: Russia's military announced the capture of the salt-mine town of Soledar, considering it an important step for advancing towards Bakhmut, though its strategic significance is debated.

events.name: Capture of Soledar
events.wd_description: Russian forces claimed to have captured the town of Soledar after a prolonged battle, marking their first significant victory in Ukraine since July 2022.
events.description: Russian forces claimed to have captured the town of Soledar after a prolonged battle, marking their first significant victory in Ukraine since July 2022.

events.name: Russian Military's Next Steps
events.wd_description: Following the capture of Soledar, Russia aims to advance its troops towards the nearby city of Bakhmut, a key objective in its offensive.
events.description: Following the capture of Soledar, Russia aims to advance its troops towards the nearby city of Bakhmut, a key objective in its offensive.

events.name: Strategic Debate Over Soledar
events.wd_description: Military analysts, including the US-based Institute for the Study of War, questioned the strategic importance of Soledar, suggesting it may not significantly aid Russia's efforts to encircle Bakhmut.
events.description: Military analysts, including the US-based Institute for the Study of War, questioned the strategic importance of Soledar, suggesting it may not significantly aid Russia's efforts to encircle Bakhmut.

events.name: Opening of Ascend Elements' lithium-ion battery recycling facility
events.wd_label: Opening of Ascend Elements' lithium-ion battery recycling facility
events.wd_description: Ascend Elements opened its first commercial-scale lithium-ion battery recycling facility in Covington, Georgia. The $50 million Base 1 facility is the largest EV battery recycling facility in North America.
events.description: Ascend Elements opened its first commercial-scale lithium-ion battery recycling facility in Covington, Georgia. The $50 million Base 1 facility is the largest EV battery recycling facility in North America.

events.name: Facility opening ceremony
events.wd_description: Ascend Elements celebrated the grand opening of its Base 1 facility on March 30, 2023, marking a significant milestone in EV battery recycling.
events.description: Ascend Elements celebrated the grand opening of its Base 1 facility on March 30, 2023, marking a significant milestone in EV battery recycling.

events.name: Initial operations
events.wd_description: The facility began partial operations in August 2022, with an annual capacity to process 30,000 metric tons of used lithium-ion batteries and manufacturing scrap.
events.description: The facility began partial operations in August 2022, with an annual capacity to process 30,000 metric tons of used lithium-ion batteries and manufacturing scrap.

events.name: t: Recycling process
events.wd_description: Ascend Elements uses its patented Hydro-to-Cathode™ process to recover up to 98% of critical battery metals and reduce the carbon footprint of new EV battery cathode materials by up to 90%.
events.description: Ascend Elements uses its patented Hydro-to-Cathode™ process to recover up to 98% of critical battery metals and reduce the carbon footprint of new EV battery cathode materials by up to 90%.

events.name: t: Employment details
events.wd_description: The facility currently employs about 100 team members, with plans to increase headcount to 185 by 2024.
events.description: The facility currently employs about 100 team members, with plans to increase headcount to 185 by 2024.

events.name: t: Environmental features
events.wd_description: The facility is powered by renewable energy and features onsite wastewater recycling and treatment systems.
events.description: The facility is powered by renewable energy and features onsite wastewater recycling and treatment systems.

events.name: Future expansion plans
events.wd_description: Ascend Elements aims to continue building its closed-loop battery materials supply chain to make EV batteries cleaner and more sustainable.
events.description: Ascend Elements aims to continue building its closed-loop battery materials supply chain to make EV batteries cleaner and more sustainable.
